Package de.dedede.model.persistence.daos

Class ApplicationDao

java.lang.Object
de.dedede.model.persistence.daos.ApplicationDao
public final class ApplicationDao extends Object
This DAO (data access object) is responsible for fetching global application data from a persistent data store as well as saving to it. It implements the CRUD methods (create, read, update, delete). See the ApplicationDto class for the used DTO.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    createCustomization​(ApplicationDto appDTO)
    Writes new global application data to the persistent data store, as represented by an ApplicationDto object.
    static ApplicationDto
    deleteCustomization​(ApplicationDto appDTO)
    Deletes global application data from the persistent data store that corresponds to a given ID.

    Fetches global application data from the persistent data store.

  • Method Details

    • createCustomization

      public static void createCustomization​(ApplicationDto appDTO) throws EntityInstanceNotUniqueException
      Writes new global application data to the persistent data store, as represented by an ApplicationDto object. The enclosed ID must not be in use. Otherwise, an exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      A - DTO container with global application data to be written.
      Throws:
      EntityInstanceNotUniqueException - Is thrown if the supplied ID is already in use in the data store.
      See Also:
      ApplicationDto

    • readCustomization

      public static ApplicationDto readCustomization​(ApplicationDto appDTO) throws EntityInstanceDoesNotExistException
      Fetches global application data from the persistent data store. The enclosed ID must be present in the data store. Otherwise, an exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      appDTO - A DTO container with the ID of the global application data to be read.
      Returns:
      A DTO container with global application data identified by the passed ID.
      Throws:
      EntityInstanceDoesNotExistException - Is thrown if the supplied ID does not identify a data entry in the data store.
      See Also:
      ApplicationDto

    • updateCustomization

      public static void updateCustomization​(ApplicationDto applicationDto) throws EntityInstanceDoesNotExistException
      Overwrites global application data in the persistent data store. The enclosed ID must be present in the data store and is used to identify and remove existing data.
      Parameters:
      applicationDto - A DTO container with the overwriting data
      Throws:
      EntityInstanceDoesNotExistException - Is thrown if the supplied ID does not identify a data entry in the data store.
      See Also:
      ApplicationDto

    • deleteCustomization

      public static ApplicationDto deleteCustomization​(ApplicationDto appDTO)
      Deletes global application data from the persistent data store that corresponds to a given ID.
      Parameters:
      appDTO - A DTO container with the ID of the global application data to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A DTO container with the deleted data store entry.
      Throws:
      EntityInstanceDoesNotExistException - Is thrown if the supplied ID does not identify a data entry in the data store.
      See Also:
      ApplicationDto
